channel.title: install on My Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in install on My Hugo

item.title: Install Docker
item.description: install sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install \ apt-transport-https \ ca-certificates \ curl \ gnupg2 \ software-properties-common curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo apt-key add - sudo apt-key fingerprint 0EBFCD88 sudo add-apt-repository \ "deb [arch=amd64] https://download.docker.com/linux/$(. /etc/os-release; echo "$ID") \ $(lsb_release -cs) \ stable" sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install docker-ce # apt-cache madison docker-ce sudo groupadd docker sudo usermod -aG docker jzou sudo docker run hello-world # docker data/containers/images are stored at /var/lib/docker docker --version Docker version 17.
